description: Use this action to retrieve the engagement record for a given EngagementIdentifier.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the engagement request. Valid values are AWS and Sandbox.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: Specifies the identifier of the Engagement record to retrieve.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the engagement retrieved.

nested_items.name: Contexts
nested_items.description: A list of context objects associated with the engagement. Each context provides additional information related to the Engagement, such as customer projects or documents.

nested_items.name: CustomerProject
nested_items.description: Contains detailed information about a customer project when the context type is 'CustomerProject'. This field is present only when the Type in EngagementContextDetails is set to 'CustomerProject'.

nested_items.name: CompanyName
nested_items.description: Represents the name of the customer's company associated with the Engagement Invitation. This field is used to identify the customer.

nested_items.name: CountryCode
nested_items.description: Indicates the country in which the customer's company operates. This field is useful for understanding regional requirements or compliance needs.

nested_items.name: Industry
nested_items.description: Specifies the industry to which the customer's company belongs. This field helps categorize the opportunity based on the customer's business sector.

nested_items.name: WebsiteUrl
nested_items.description: Provides the website URL of the customer's company. This field helps partners verify the legitimacy and size of the customer organization.

nested_items.name: BusinessProblem
nested_items.description: A description of the business problem the project aims to solve.

nested_items.name: TargetCompletionDate
nested_items.description: The target completion date for the customer's project.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of Engagement context. Valid values are 'CustomerProject' or 'Document', indicating whether the context relates to a customer project or a document respectively.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the Engagement was created, presented in ISO 8601 format (UTC). For example: '2023-05-01T20:37:46Z'. This timestamp helps track the lifecycle of the Engagement.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the user who originally created the engagement. This field helps in tracking the origin of the engagement.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A more detailed description of the engagement. This provides additional context or information about the engagement's purpose or scope.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique resource identifier of the engagement retrieved.

nested_items.name: MemberCount
nested_items.description: Specifies the current count of members participating in the Engagement. This count includes all active members regardless of their roles or permissions within the Engagement.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the engagement. It provides a brief, descriptive name for the engagement that is meaningful and easily recognizable.
